title: Bots In ARAM
body:
I've never seen bots in Smmoner's Rift, probably because it's more difficult to program or something. 
-
So I've noticed bots in ARAM lately. Like usually I see the bots in twisted treeline, 75 percent of the time. I've been farming ARAM games to get use to different characters, when I notice a weird pattern in names, which I detect instantly from having so many bots in my twisted treeline games.
Here's a picture... https://i.imgur.com/GfjSO1A.png
**H is for Human, Underline is assumed bots.**

replies.body:
I've seen heaps of bots, both in aram and rift.
Also seeing an increase in scripting, I had games all the time with scripters now.
I literally just finished a game with scripters in it, I'd post link to the game but do not know how.
Moi aussi j'en ai eut hier soir en aram
